name: fusengine-plugins
description: Collection of professional Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: commit-pro
plugins.description: Professional git commits with Conventional Commits, auto-detection, and security validation

plugins.name: laravel-expert
plugins.description: Expert Laravel 12 + PHP 8.5 with SOLID principles, Eloquent, Livewire, and comprehensive documentation

plugins.name: nextjs-expert
plugins.description: Expert Next.js 16 + React 19 with App Router, Server Components, Prisma 7, Better Auth, and modular architecture

plugins.name: swift-apple-expert
plugins.description: Expert Swift 6 + SwiftUI for all Apple platforms with @Observable, actors, and WWDC 2025 best practices
